en_text: 4x ATK for matched Att. when matching 5 Orbs with 1+ enhanced

jp_skill.name: ダーリン
jp_skill.raw_description: 強化ドロップを含めて5個消した属性の攻撃力が4倍。

kr_skill.name: 달링~
kr_skill.raw_description: 강화드롭을 포함하여 5개를 지운 속성의 공격력이 4배가 됨

na_skill.name: Darling
na_skill.raw_description: 4x ATK when erasing 5 Orbs with 1+ enhanced
